description: Standard table definitions for lending protocols.

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: List of lending pools in this protocol.

chainId.description: The standard id of the chain.

creationBlockNumber.description: The block this pool was created in.

creationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the block that this pool was created in.

underlyingTokenAddress.description: The contract address of the underlying token.

underlyingTokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token.

receiptTokenAddress.description: The contract address of the receipt token.

receiptTokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the receipt token.

poolAddress.description: The contract address of the pool.

poolType.description: The type of the pool (ie, collateral_only, isolated, supply_pool, cdp).

tables.label: Position Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot of user positions in the lending protocol.

chainId.description: The standard id of the chain.

poolAddress.description: The contract address of the pool.

underlyingTokenAddress.description: The contract address of the underlying token.

underlyingTokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token.

userAddress.description: The address of the user who has the position.

suppliedAmount.description: The amount supplied by the user in native terms, normalized by underlying decimals.

borrowedAmount.description: The amount borrowed by the user normalized to native terms, using underlying decimals.

collateralAmount.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral-only tokens of this asset, normalized.

collateralUsd.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral-only tokens in USD.

chainId.description: The standard id of the chain.

poolAddress.description: The contract address of the pool.

underlyingTokenAddress.description: The contract address of the underlying token.

underlyingTokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token.

availableAmount.description: The amount of token's available to borrow (ie, liquidity or net supply or supply - borrow).

availableTvlUsd.description: The available amount of token's in this pool in USD.

totalSuppliedAmount.description: The total amount of the underlying token supplied in this pool normalized.

collateralAmount.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral only tokens in this pool.

collateralUsd.description: (Optional) THe amount of collateral only tokens in the pool.

collateralFactor.description: The collateral factor of the pool (defined as a percentage, between 0-100).

supplyIndex.description: The supply index of the pool.

supplyApr.description: The current annual percentage rate for supplied amount.

supplyIncentiveApr.description: The incentive annual percentage rate for supply.

borrowedAmount.description: The amount of underlying tokens borrowed from this pool, normalized to the underlying token.

borrowIndex.description: The borrow index of the pool.

borrowApr.description: The annual percentage rate for borrow.

borrowIncentiveApr.description: The incentive annual percentage rate for borrow.

feesUsd.description: The total revenue / fees accrued in this pool during the given snapshot period.

incentiveAmount.description: The amount of incentives distributed in this pool during the given snapshot period, decimal normalized.

incentiveUsd.description: The amount of incentives distributed, in USD.

timestamp.description: The timestamp the snapshot was taken.

chainId.description: The standard id of the chain.

tvlUsd.description: The total value locked in the protocol in USD. (ie, the total deposit or supplied amount).

borrowAmountUsd.description: The total amount of tokens borrowed in USD.

availableAmountUsd.description: The amount of tokens available to borrow in this protocol in USD.

collateralUsd.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral only assets available in USD.

feesUsd.description: The total revenue and fees collected by the protocol in the gicen snapshot period, in USD.
